alert.note: Alert for Boone (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, CENTRAL DEARBORN AND NORTHERN BOONE COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 930 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Aurora, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Rising Sun, Burlington, Hidden Valley, Oakbrook, Shawnee, Guilford, Wilmington, Manchester, French, Mount Sinai, Belleview, Idlewild, Waterloo, Petersburg, Rabbit Hash, Hebron and Cvg Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
